name: Mysland
description:
Due To Performance Issues Is Highly Recommended To Download The Game. Mysland

You Are A Millionaire Who Has Discovered This Very Interesting Island. Indeed, Underneath It There Is An Incredible Amount Of Gold And Petrol. Your Goal Is To Collect As Many Resources As Possible And To Get Richer And Richer. Are You Ready To Build Your First Mine?

... But Wait? Isn't Something Missing!?

Mysland Is A Relaxing Idle Game In Which You Have To Build Mines And Petrol Stations To Collect Gold And Petrol, And Put Them Into Your Deposits.

ControlsWASD / Middle Wheel PressedMove
E/QRotate BlocksLMBPlace / Remove BlockMiddle Wheel In / OutZoom In / Out

Game Made For Godot Wild Game Jam 31 In 9 Days.
